title: Seeds Of Legend: Book One
description: Within each legend lies the seeds for a legacy at legend's end. Seeds of Legend tells a tale of an epic legacy left behind after the death of King Arthur and his son Mordred. A bastard daughter, Amrie, born to Arthur and the daughter of a favored knight, is the seed of legend that carries a royal legacy of the Pendragon House. With great attention to details of life in medieval times, Seeds Of Legend, Book One weaves the tale of the first years of Amrie's life within the saga of Arthur. Strong characters, an imaginative plot filled with legend and magic will carry you as you see her life unfold. Battle, political intrigue, suicide and romance shape the world Amrie is born to, and mold her as she grows. With the guidance of Merlin and the power of royalty Amrie carves out a place in the kingdom in this first installment of Seeds Of Legend.
author: Robbin L. Stoddard
